titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to permit amounts in the Department of Justice Assets Forfeiture Fund to be used for payments of certain State and local property taxes on forfeited real property.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1445)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 6/9/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal judicial code to make the Department of Justice Assets Forfeiture Fund available for purposes of the payment of State and local property taxes on forfeited real property, beginning on the date of the offense giving rise to the forfeiture and ending on the day before the date of the order of forfeiture.
